```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

Set seed for reproducibility.

```{r}
set.seed(12345)
```

## Lists

```{r}
vec_numeric = 1:4
vec_char = c("my", "name", "is", "jeff")

tibble(
  num = vec_numeric, 
  char = vec_char
)
```

Different stuff with different lengths

```{r}
l = 
  list(
      vec_numeric = 1:5,
      vec_char = LETTERS,
      matrix = matrix(1:10, nrow = 5, ncol = 2),
      summary = summary(rnorm(100))
)
```
